verses.roman:
ācāryere prasāda diyā kari' namaskāra
samyak kahila mahāprabhura samācāra

synonyms: ācāryere—unto Śrī Advaita Ācārya; prasāda—the remnants of Jagannātha's food; diyā—delivering; kari'—making; namaskāra—obeisances; samyak—completely; kahila—informed; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; samācāra—news.
translation: After paying Him respectful obeisances, Kṛṣṇadāsa offered mahā-prasāda to Advaita Ācārya. He then informed Him of the news of Lord Caitanya in complete detail.
